name: Easy Tour
description:
Developed an AI web app for Tourism that maps out your trip for you:

1. Implemented color-to-emotion model using Google Vision to tag Flickr photos

2. Performed RESTful API calls and CRUD operations to JSON files using Node.js to correct resting tremor symptoms.

3. Rendered 3-D interactive map routes using HTML and MapBox GL JS.

Languages and Frameworks: : HTML/CSS, Node.js, Google Cloud Vision, Flickr API, MapBox API.
